Are you a **student** looking to grow professionally and personally? Do you have an interest in open-source technology? We are excited to announce our upcoming event "How to grow as a student in the open source community".If you happen to be busy as the product is held, you may wanna have a look of the [activity summary](https://affine.pro/blog/tips-where-and-how-contribute-open-source-projects)





Are you a **student** looking to grow professionally and personally? Do you have an interest in open-source technology? We are excited to announce our upcoming event "How to grow as a student in the open source community".





**Join us on 18th May 2023  at 10:30 pm UTC+8** for an interactive discussion with seasoned members of the open-source community as they share their experiences and provide tips on how to excel as a student in the field. We will be exploring real-world challenges that students commonly face and how to overcome them, including how to make meaningful contributions to open-source projects and networking with fellow students and professionals.





But it doesn't stop there! This event is just the beginning, as we plan to host a series of activities focused on developing the skills and experiences needed to succeed in the open-source community. We hope to build a community of like-minded students where we can learn from each other, share ideas, and collaborate on relevant projects.





So what are you waiting for? Register now and mark your calendars for this exciting event. Let's grow together as students in the open-source community!
